H0.text: Used in mathematics, what is the value of Pi to three decimal places. 3.125

H1.text: Used in mathematics, what is the value of Pi to three decimal places. 3.201

H2.text: Used in mathematics, what is the value of Pi to three decimal places. 3.081

H3.text: Used in mathematics, what is the value of Pi to three decimal places. 3.142

A4.text: The number π is approximately equal to 3.14159

A5.text: The Indian astronomer Aryabhata used a value of 3.1416 in his Āryabhaṭīya (499 AD).
